content:
In the PR adding min_specialization https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/68970 it mentions future work like:

  • Update libcore and liballoc to compile with min_specialization.
  • Add a lint to forbid use of feature(specialization) (and other unsound, type system extending features) in the standard library.

Has this already been done? Is there a tracking issue just for min_specialization?
